document_data.name: Bayberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Bayberry''' was a variety of evergreen shrub in the Realms that bore a fruit of the same name.{{Cite dragon/179/Magic by Candlelight|17}}
document_data.Description: The berries of this shrub were covered with a waxy coating.
document_data.Usages: A bushel of bayberries could yield about {{SIrange|4|5|lb|long=yes}} of a pleasant-smelling, green wax.{{Cite polyhedron/136/City Stories: The Temple of Selûne|10}} which were used in the practice of [[druid]]ic [[candle magic]]. During the winter solstice, on the [[Selûnite]] holiday of [[Alban Arthan]], many in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] would light such candles during the day and leave them burning until they went out.
